timeline.bodyText: URLs → data? It allows to import whole messages.
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest exim (the same as the add-on ID), to reduce the likelihood of conflicts with other add-ons.
timeline.author: thc202
thc202

timeline.bodyText: This needs to be changed, if the view is not initialised it should not execute in the EDT.
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest removing this (and related logic in persistMessage), it's very unlikely that the IDs would still match.
timeline.author: thc202
